front.title: BGP Flowspec Redirect Load Balancing Group Community

abstract.t: This document defines an extension to "BGP Community Container Attribute" [I-D.ietf-idr-wide-bgp-communities] , which allows flowspec redirection to multiple paths. This extended community serves to redirect traffic to a load balancing group and supports both equal-cost multi-path(ECMP) and unequal-cost multi-path(UCMP) scenarios.
